Detailed Description

Core libraies version information.

This simple class lows to access to information about the current TREX version of TREX core libararies

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

unsigned long TREX::version::number (  )  [static]

version number

Indicates the version number of this library. This version number follows the same nomenclature as th boost versionning and is guaranteed to increase as we have new versions.

Returns:
100*(100*major()+minor())+release()
See also:
major()
minor()
release()
str()

std::string TREX::version::str (  )  [static]

Human readable version.

Indicates the version number as a human readable string the string is formatted the usual way : <major>.<minor>.<patch>

Returns:
The string value for this version
See also:
major()
minor()
